name: Santa Mayhem
description:
What Is Santa Mayhem

Santa Mayhem is a 2D shooter in 3D platform which is 2.5D shooter. Our character is a well-known Santa who is trying to bring Christmas to the town. But evil snowmen trying to stop him. So with our AK-47, we are trying to get rid of them with the help of our trusty comrade "Rudolf" which is a moose.

How to Play Santa Mayhem

*By using "W, A, S, D" keys you can move your character.
*By clicking left mouse button you can fire your gun in any direction you want.

*By aiming to the Snowmen you can kill them and gain scores.
*It is indicated with red when you hit the snowmen.
*When you managed to kill one Snowman, it's split into two.
*You can die if you do not keep your distance with Snowmen.
*After 30 second later your comrade "Rudolf" comes to help you.
*Rudolf is aiming to the opposite direction where you are aiming.
*With the help of Rudolf, it is easier to kill the Snowmen.
*If you can survive 100 seconds, you win the game.
*It is indicated with audio effect when Snowmen spawn or Rudolf comes.
